member.summary: if true, stop fading when mouse is over the Show

member.summary: if true, begin by fading into the first panel (available when TransitionType = Fading)

member.summary: speed of scrolling(lower value = slower)

member.summary: step of scrolling(lower value = slower)

members.member: defines the panels show type: show manual
defines the panels transition type None - no transition available Fading - fading effect Scroll - scroll effect
defines the direction where the panel are going on Scroll transition effect Left - goes to the left Right - goes to the right Top - goes up Bottom - goes down
defines the changer of the panels type: arrow - left and right arrow for changing the styles forward and backwards number - numeric panel like datagrid type for changing the panels

defines the arrows position when used together with numbers Side1 - on the left/top side of the numbers Side2 - on the right/bottom side of the numbers BothSides - one arrow on the left/top and another one on the right/bottom
defines the changer position types top - on top of the panels bottom - on bottom of the panels left - the left side of the panels right - the right side of the panels
defines the changer vertical align into the changer container
defines the changer horizontal align into the changer container
image file extensions supported by the images loader
